    • sendReferralEmail

      public EmptyResponse sendReferralEmail​(java.lang.String evApiKey, java.lang.String evAccessToken, Body15 body) throws ApiException
      Send referral email to a given address Invite a friend to sign up for a free trial of ExaVault. Send a [referral](/lp/referafriend/) email to an email address. If the recipient signs up for ExaVault, we'll apply a credit to your account for the referral.
      Parameters:
      evApiKey - API Key required to make the API call. (required)
      evAccessToken - Access token required to make the API call. (required)
      body - (optional)
      Returns:
      EmptyResponse
      Throws:
      ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      Send referral email to a given address (asynchronously) Invite a friend to sign up for a free trial of ExaVault. Send a [referral](/lp/referafriend/) email to an email address. If the recipient signs up for ExaVault, we'll apply a credit to your account for the referral.

      public EmptyResponse sendWelcomeEmail​(java.lang.String evApiKey, java.lang.String evAccessToken, java.lang.String username) throws ApiException
      Resend welcome email to specific user Send a welcome email to a user. The contents of the welcome email can be set by [PATCH /accounts](#operation/updateAccount).

      evAccessToken - Access token required to make the API call. (required)
      username - A username to send the welcome email to. (required)

    • sendWelcomeEmailAsync

      public com.squareup.okhttp.Call sendWelcomeEmailAsync​(java.lang.String evApiKey, java.lang.String evAccessToken, java.lang.String username, ApiCallback<EmptyResponse> callback) throws ApiException
      Resend welcome email to specific user (asynchronously) Send a welcome email to a user. The contents of the welcome email can be set by [PATCH /accounts](#operation/updateAccount).
      Parameters:
      evApiKey - API Key required to make the API call. (required)
      evAccessToken - Access token required to make the API call. (required)
      username - A username to send the welcome email to. (required)
      callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes
      Returns:
      The request call
      Throws:
